operations.summary: Describe an existing MgMap instance from the specified mapname and session id and returns detailed information about its layer/group structure if requested

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Your MapGuide Session ID. If none specified you must pass the basic http authentication challenge

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The map name used to identify the MgMap instance

parameters.name: requestedfeatures
parameters.description: A bitmask of the information about the Runtime Map that you would like returned. 1=Layer/Group structure, 2=icons, 4=Feature Source Information

parameters.name: iconformat
parameters.description: The desired icon image format if icons are requested

parameters.name: iconwidth
parameters.description: The desired width of generated icons if icons are requested

parameters.name: iconheight
parameters.description: The desired height of generated icons if icons are requested

parameters.name: iconsperscalerange
parameters.description: The number of icons to generate per scale range if icons are requested

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Renders an image of the specified runtime map. Will also modify the map's state based on the parameters you specify

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate of the map center to render

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the map center to render

parameters.name: keepselection
parameters.description: Indicates whether any selection should be retained

parameters.name: dpi
parameters.description: The display DPI. If not specified, defaults to 96

parameters.name: showlayers
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer object ids

parameters.name: showgroups
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer group ids

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer object ids

parameters.name: hidegroups
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer group ids

operations.summary: Renders a dynamic overlay image of the specified runtime map. Will also modify the map's state based on the parameters you specify

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: selectioncolor
parameters.description: The selection color as HTML color string

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: A bitmask controlling rendering behavior. 1=Render Selection, 2=Render layers, 4=Keep Selection, 8=Render Base Layers (only for MapGuide Open Source 2.5 and above)

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X coordinate of the map center to render

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y coordinate of the map center to render

parameters.name: keepselection
parameters.description: Indicates whether any selection should be retained

parameters.name: dpi
parameters.description: The display DPI. If not specified, defaults to 96

parameters.name: showlayers
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer object ids

parameters.name: showgroups
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer group ids

parameters.name: hidelayers
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer object ids

parameters.name: hidegroups
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer group ids

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Plot the map to the specified type using the center and scale from the map

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: printlayout
parameters.description: The PrintLayout resource to use for plotting. Only applies if plotting to DWF

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title to put in the plot

parameters.name: layeredpdf
parameters.description: Indicates whether to produce a layered PDF. Only applies if plotting PDFs. This is slower than regular PDF plot, but produces a PDF with the same layer structure as the map

operations.summary: Updates the map selection according to some spatial criteria

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: layernames
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of layer names

parameters.name: geometry
parameters.description: The WKT of the intersecting geometry

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number features to select as a result of this operation

parameters.name: persist
parameters.description: If true, will cause this operation to modify the selection set

parameters.name: requestdata
parameters.description: A bitmask specifying the information to return in the response. 1=Attributes, 2=Inline Selection, 4=Tooltip, 8=Hyperlink

parameters.name: featurefilter
parameters.description: An XML selection string containing the required feature IDs

parameters.name: layerattributefilter
parameters.description: Bitmask value determining which layers will be queried. 1=Visible, 2=Selectable, 4=HasTooltips

parameters.name: selectionxml
parameters.description: Indicates if the 'featurefilter' parameter is to be treated as selection XML

parameters.name: append
parameters.description: Indicates if the this query selection should append to the current selection

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Gets the features from the given layer in the selection set

parameters.name: mapName
parameters.description: The name of the runtime map

parameters.name: layerName
parameters.description: The name of the layer in the selection set

parameters.name: mappedonly
parameters.description: Only return properties mapped in the Layer Definition

parameters.name: transformto
parameters.description: The CS-Map coordinate system code to transform these features to

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the number of results for the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the page number of the page. You must specify a valid page size value (> 0) for this parameter to apply.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: The display orientation of feature attribuutes. Only applies if type is html. h=horizontal, v=vertical

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
An error occurred during the operation
